Elia Ravelomanantsoa (amụrụ n'afọ 1960) bụ onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị Madagascar na onye isi nchịkwa nke Synergy-FCB
A mụrụ ya na Antananarivo, Ravelomanantsoa malitere azụmahịa mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na asaa
O guzobere mmemme ejiji Manja n'afọ 1986
Site n'afọ 1990 ruo afọ 1993, ọ nọ na Kọmitii nke Group of Reflection and Action for the Development of Madagascar
N'afọ 1996, o guzobere Democratic Participation for Economic and Social Redress na Madagascar
Nke a nwere agamniihu pere mpe, merie obodo Moramanga.
N'afọ 2004, a họpụtara Ravelomanantsoa ka ọ bụrụ onye isi oche nke Global Congress of Black Women
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Femmes entrepreneurs de Madagascar ugbu a
Ọ bụkwa osote onye isi oche nke French Carrefour des entrepreneurs.
N'afọ 2006, Ravelomanantsoa ghọrọ nwanyị mbụ guzoro ịbụ onye isi ala nke Madagascar, mgbe ọ sonyere na ntuli aka onye isi ala e mere na Disemba nke afọ ahụ
O gbara onye nke asaa ma nweta pasentị 2.56% nke vootu niile atụrụ.
